mapper.select: select m.id, m.username, m.nickname, m.at_created_time, m.at_updated_time from member m where m.is_deleted = false
select m.id, m.username, m.nickname, m.at_created_time, m.at_updated_time from member m where m.is_deleted = false and m.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into member(username, password, nickname, at_created_time, at_updated_time) values (#{username}, #{password}, #{nickname}, now(), now())
